note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: External call to `_addr.call.value(_wei)` is made before updating the `Holders` mapping, allowing a reentrant fallback to observe or manipulate the unchanged state
Missing onlyOwner modifier on initialization function, allowing anyone to reinitialize the contract and overwrite owner and MinDeposit
Low-level calls using .call and .call.value are made without checking their returned boolean success values.

External token transfer invoked via low-level call (token.call) after resetting the holder’s balance without checking the call’s success. If the token contract’s transfer fails, funds are locked and cannot be withdrawn, causing a denial of service.
initTokenBank is intended as a constructor but is a public function; anyone can call it to reset owner and MinDeposit, thus taking control of the contract
